t: It's official: Amazon to build $11 billion data center near South Bend
s: April 26, 2024 - After months of speculation, Amazon confirms it plans to build $11 billion data center in southwest St. Joseph County near New Carlisle.

t: Packages are rolling out of South Bend's new Amazon facility, but not everyone is thrilled
s: July 25, 2019 - Amazon packages are rolling out the doors of a new facility in South Bend. t: Amazon delivery station in South Bend brings jobs, gets backlash
s: July 25, 2019 - Amazon told 16 News Now that the new 84,000-square-foot facility will bring around 200 part-time and full-time jobs to South Bend. But a group calling itself No Amazon South Bend would like to see them go.
